32 namespace TiledArray {

35 // Forward declarations
36 template <typename>
37 class BinaryExpr;
38 template <typename>
39 class BinaryEngine;
40 
41 template <typename Derived>
42 class BinaryEngine : public ExprEngine<Derived> {
43  public:
44  // Class hierarchy typedefs
45  typedef BinaryEngine<Derived> BinaryEngine_;
46  typedef ExprEngine<Derived> ExprEngine_;
47 
48  // Argument typedefs
49  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::left_type
50  left_type;
51  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::right_type
52  right_type;
53 
54  // Operational typedefs
55  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::value_type
56  value_type;
57  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::op_type
58  op_type;
59  typedef
60  typename EngineTrait<Derived>::policy policy;
61  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::dist_eval_type
62  dist_eval_type;
63 
64  // Meta data typedefs
65  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::size_type size_type;
66  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::trange_type
67  trange_type;
68  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::shape_type shape_type;
69  typedef typename EngineTrait<Derived>::pmap_interface
70  pmap_interface;
71 
72  static constexpr bool consumable = EngineTrait<Derived>::consumable;
73  static constexpr unsigned int leaves = EngineTrait<Derived>::leaves;
74 
75  protected:
76  // Import base class variables to this scope
77  using ExprEngine_::perm_;
78  using ExprEngine_::permute_tiles_;
79  using ExprEngine_::pmap_;
80  using ExprEngine_::shape_;
81  using ExprEngine_::trange_;
82  using ExprEngine_::vars_;
83  using ExprEngine_::world_;
84 
85  left_type left_;
86  right_type right_;
87 
88  public:
89  template <typename D>
90  BinaryEngine(const BinaryExpr<D>& expr)
91  : ExprEngine_(expr), left_(expr.left()), right_(expr.right()) {}
92 
94 
100  void perm_vars(const VariableList& target_vars) {
101  TA_ASSERT(permute_tiles_);
102  TA_ASSERT(left_.vars().dim() == target_vars.dim());
103  TA_ASSERT(right_.vars().dim() == target_vars.dim());
104 
105  // Determine the equality of the variable lists
106  bool left_target = true, right_target = true, left_right = true;
107  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < target_vars.dim(); ++i) {
108  left_target = left_target && left_.vars()[i] == target_vars[i];
109  right_target = right_target && right_.vars()[i] == target_vars[i];
110  left_right = left_right && left_.vars()[i] == right_.vars()[i];
111  }
112 
113  if (left_right) {
114  vars_ = left_.vars();
115  } else {
116  // Determine which argument will be permuted
117  const bool perm_left =
118  (right_target || ((!(left_target || right_target)) &&
119  (left_type::leaves <= right_type::leaves)));
120 
121  if (perm_left) {
122  vars_ = right_.vars();
123  left_.perm_vars(right_.vars());
124  } else {
125  vars_ = left_.vars();
126  right_.perm_vars(left_.vars());
127  }
128  }
129  }
130 
132 
134  void init_vars(const VariableList& target_vars) {
135  left_.init_vars(target_vars);
136  right_.init_vars(target_vars);
137  perm_vars(target_vars);
138  }
139 
141  void init_vars() {
142  if (left_type::leaves <= right_type::leaves) {
143  left_.init_vars();
144  vars_ = left_.vars();
145  right_.init_vars(vars_);
146  } else {
147  right_.init_vars();
148  vars_ = right_.vars();
149  left_.init_vars(vars_);
150  }
151  }
152 
154 
158  void init_struct(const VariableList& target_vars) {
159  left_.init_struct(ExprEngine_::vars());
160  right_.init_struct(ExprEngine_::vars());
161 #ifndef NDEBUG
162  if (left_.trange() != right_.trange()) {
163  if (TiledArray::get_default_world().rank() == 0) {
164  TA_USER_ERROR_MESSAGE(
165  "The TiledRanges of the left- and right-hand arguments of the "
166  "binary operation are not equal:"
167  << "\n left = " << left_.trange()
168  << "\n right = " << right_.trange());
169  }
170 
171  TA_EXCEPTION(
172  "The TiledRanges of the left- and right-hand arguments "
173  "of the binary operation are not equal.");
174  }
175 #endif // NDEBUG
176  ExprEngine_::init_struct(target_vars);
177  }
178 
180 
185  void init_distribution(World* world,
186  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap) {
187  left_.init_distribution(world, pmap);
188  right_.init_distribution(world, left_.pmap());
189  ExprEngine_::init_distribution(world, left_.pmap());
190  }
191 
193 
195  trange_type make_trange() const { return left_.trange(); }
196 
198 
201  trange_type make_trange(const Permutation& perm) const {
202  return perm * left_.trange();
203  }
204 
206 
208  dist_eval_type make_dist_eval() const {
209  typedef TiledArray::detail::BinaryEvalImpl<
210  typename left_type::dist_eval_type, typename right_type::dist_eval_type,
211  op_type, policy>
212  impl_type;
213 
214  // Construct left and right distributed evaluators
215  const typename left_type::dist_eval_type left = left_.make_dist_eval();
216  const typename right_type::dist_eval_type right = right_.make_dist_eval();
217 
218  // Construct the distributed evaluator type
219  std::shared_ptr<impl_type> pimpl =
220  std::make_shared<impl_type>(left, right, *world_, trange_, shape_,
221  pmap_, perm_, ExprEngine_::make_op());
222 
223  return dist_eval_type(pimpl);
224  }
225 
227 
230  void print(ExprOStream os, const VariableList& target_vars) const {
231  ExprEngine_::print(os, target_vars);
232  os.inc();
233  left_.print(os, vars_);
234  right_.print(os, vars_);
235  os.dec();
236  }
237 }; // class BinaryEngine
238 
239 } // namespace expressions
240 } // namespace TiledArray
